prone.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: likely to do something or suffer from something, especially something bad or harmful
prone.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Some plants are very prone to disease.
Kids are all prone to eat junk food.
prone.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: lying down with the front of your body facing down
prone.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His eyes shifted to the prone body on the floor.
